properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Storm Warning issued January 15 at 7:50AM PST until January 15 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds rising to 35 to 45 kt with gusts to 55 kt by
noon, then becoming southwest 25 to 30 kt with gusts to 40 kt by
this evening. Combined seas building to 18 to 23 feet at
13 seconds this afternoon.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out
10 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should remain in port, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
